messages.quiet: 당신의 그룹에 대한 어떤 것도 이메일로 받지 않습니다.

mute_explanation_modal.body_html:
Muting means you won't be notified about proposals, or any other activity in this thread, unless someone @mentions you.

Muted threads are hidden from Recent and Unread pages too. To find your Muted threads, select the Muted option in the sidebar:

dismiss_explanation_modal.body_html: Dismissing a thread removes it from your unread items. If any new activity occurs in the thread, it will show as unread again.

sign_up_form.title: 로미오에 오신 것을 환영합니다.  환경설정을 하세요.

proposal_form.editing_title_and_description_forbidden: You cannot change the title or description of a proposal after people have voted. If details have changed, please close the proposal and start another.
proposal_form.title_placeholder: Eg: Let’s go to the moon
proposal_form.details_placeholder: Give enough detail so everyone knows exactly what it means to agree or disagree with your proposal

discussion_form.context_placeholder: 생산적인 토론이 될 수 있도록 사람들에게 충분한 배경 정보를 제공해주세요.  토론이 진행됨에 따라 배경정보가 업데이트될 수 있습니다.

empty.membership_is_invitation_by_admin_only: 코디네이터의 초대를 받아야 가입할 수 있는 그룹입니다.

group_page.discussions_placeholder: 이 쓰레드는 누구나 토론할 수 있고, 함께 의사결정을 하는 곳입니다.
group_page.members_placeholder: 이 그룹에 현재 회원님 뿐입니다. 다른 사람들을 초대해 보세요.
group_page.subgroups_placeholder: Subgroups give teams their own space and keep notifications focused to the right people.

volume.loud_aria_description: 이 그룹의 알림 소리를 크게 설정합니다. 이 그룹에 활동이 있을 때마다 이메일을 받습니다.
volume.loud_message: "{{name}}." 그룹의 모든 활동 내역을 이메일로 받습니다.
volume.normal: 새로운 쓰레드 생성이나 제안, 결과 산출 등 중요한 활동 내역에 대해서만 이메일 합니다.
volume.normal_aria_description: 이 그룹의 알림 소리를 보통으로 설정합니다. 누군가 새로운 쓰레드를 시작하거나 중요한 활동이 있을 때만 이메일을 받습니다.
volume.quiet: 이 그룹의 이메일을 받지 않습니. 활동내역은 대시보드에서만 볼 수 있습니다.
volume.quiet_aria_description: 이 그룹의 알림 소리가 묵음으로 설정됩니다. 이 그룹의 활동내역에 귀하에게 이메일을 발송하지 않습니다. 활동 내역은 대시보드에 보여집니다.
volume.quiet_message: "{{name}}." 그룹의 활동 내역에 대해 귀하에게 이메일을 보내지 않습니다.
volume.mute: @mentioned로 언급되기 전까지는 이 그룹을 대시보드에서 감추고 알림을 비활성화해주세요.
volume.mute_aria_description: 이 그룹의 알림 소리가 묵음으로 설정됩니다. 누군가 당신을 언급하지 않는 한, 이 그룹의 활동내역에 대해 귀하에게 이메일을 발송하지 않습니다. 대시보드에 그룹 활동 내역이 보여지지 않습니다.

privacy.parent_members: 공개정책 : 이 그룹은 {{parentGroupName}}의 멤버와 {{groupName}}의 멤버에게 공개됩니다.

description_card.placeholder: Groups coordinators can use this area to describe the group’s purpose, so everyone knows why they are here.

group_form.group_name_placeholder: What do you want to call your group?

privacy_statement.private_to_parent_members: {{parent}}의 멤버가 이름과 설명을 볼 수 있습니다.

group_form.group_privacy_is_open_description: Anyone can find the group and ask to join. Only members can see who is in the group. All threads are public.
group_form.group_privacy_is_closed_description: Anyone can find the group and ask to join. Only members can see who is in the group. All threads are private.
group_form.group_privacy_is_closed_public_threads_d: Anyone can find the group and ask to join. Only members can see who is in the group. Threads can be public or private.
group_form.group_privacy_is_secret_description: Only invited members can find the group, see who is in it and see threads.
group_form.confirm_change_to_secret: 이 그룹의 모든 쓰레드와 소그룹이 비공개로 전환됩니다. 확실합니까?
group_form.confirm_change_to_public: 이 그룹의 모든 쓰레드가 웹에 공개됩니다. 계속하시겠습니까?
group_form.confirm_change_to_private_discussions_on: 이 그룹의 공개된 모든 쓰레드가 비공개로 전환됩니다. 계속하시겠습니까?
group_form.subgroup_privacy_is_open_description: Anyone can find this subgroup and ask to join. Only members can see who is in the group. All threads are public.
group_form.subgroup_privacy_is_closed_description: Anyone can find this subgroup and ask to join. Only members can see who is in the group. All threads are private.
group_form.subgroup_privacy_is_closed_public_thread: Anyone can find this subgroup and ask to join. Only members can see who is in the group. Threads can be public or private.
group_form.subgroup_privacy_is_closed_secret_parent: Members of {{parent}} can find this subgroup and ask to join. All threads are private. Only members can see who is in the group.
group_form.subgroup_privacy_is_secret_description: Only invited members can find this subgroup, see who is in it and see threads.
group_form.membership_granted_upon_approval: 누구나 가입 신청을 할 수 있습니다만, 가입 허가가 필요합니다.
group_form.membership_granted_upon_approval_secret_: By request anyone from {{parent}} can ask to join the group.
group_form.public_discussions_subgroup: {{parentGroupName}}의 누구나 이 토론을 볼 수 있습니다.
group_form.private_threads: 오직 멤버만 이 토론을 볼 수 있습니다.
group_form.parent_members_can_see_discussions: Members of {{parent}} can see private threads.
group_form.members_can_add_members: 멤버는 다른 사람을 초대할 수 있고 가입요청을 승인할 수 있습니다.
group_form.members_can_edit_discussions: 멤버는 어느 토론의 제목이나 내용을 변경할 수 있습니다.
group_form.members_can_edit_comments: 멤버는 자신의 댓글을 언제든 수정할 수 있습니다.
group_form.members_can_start_discussions: 멤버는 새 쓰레드를 만들 수 있습니다.

membership_requests_page.no_previous_requests: 현재 사전 신청된 멤버십 요청이 없습니다.

invitation_form.shareable_link_explanation: 링크를 복사해서 그룹에 초대하고 싶은 사람에게 보내십시요. 초대받은 사람은 그룹의 모든 모둠(Threads)에 접근할 수 있다.
invitation_form.email_explanation: 그 대신에, 아래 이메일주소로 들어가면 루미오가 이메일로 초대장을 보낸다.

messages.no_invitations: Uhoh! Please verify the email address is correct and try again.
messages.max_invitations: 만일 100개 이상의 초대장을 보내려면 팀 링크를 사용하세요.

remove_membership_form.title: 멤버 삭제
remove_membership_form.question: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from {{group}}?

contact_request_form.message_placeholder: Introduce yourself and share why you'd like to make contact.
contact_request_form.helptext: {{name}} will be emailed your name, email address, and message

profile_page.short_bio_placeholder: Please introduce yourself, include areas of expertise, topics of interest, and any affiliated organizations

change_picture_form.title: 사진 교체
change_picture_form.helptext: You can upload your own profile picture, or if you have a Gravatar account, you can use that.

change_password_form.set_password_helptext: Please enter a password to log in with - minimum 8 characters
change_password_form.change_password_helptext: Forgotten your password or want to change it? Simply enter a new password here.

deactivation_modal.name_removed: Comments, proposals and discussions you’ve made will remain but your name will be removed from them
deactivation_modal.no_emails: You will no longer receive Loomiorelated emails

deactivate_user_form.title: 계정 비활성화
deactivate_user_form.question: Would you tell us why you are deactivating?
deactivate_user_form.placeholder: 이 질문에 답하지 않으셔도 됩니다. 이렇게 정보를 공유해주시면 루미오를 향상시키는데 도움이 됩니다. :)

only_coordinator_modal.explanation: 이 그룹에는 한 명의 코디네이터만 있어야 합니다. 새로운 코디네이터를 추가를 원하십니까?
only_coordinator_modal.instructions: 당신의 계정을 비활성화 하기 위해서 위에 언급된 각 그룹을 방문해 다른 사람을 코디네이터로 만들든지, 그룹을 비활성화해야 합니다.

email_settings_page.daily_summary_description: Each morning, you will get an email with any activity that you missed the day before. This email provides an easy routine for staying up to date with Loomio activity.
email_settings_page.on_participation_description: 모둠에 참여하면, 더욱 많은 행동들이 즉시 당신에게 이메일로 전송됩니다.
email_settings_page.mentioned_description: 누군가 당신과 이야기하고 싶을 경우 @언급할 겁니다. 사람들이 언급할 때마다 이메일을 받게 되기 때문에 사용하는게 좋습니다.

default_settings.loud_description: 새로운 그룹에 참여하면, 당신은 행동이 있을 때마다이메일을 받을 수 있습니다.
default_settings.normal_description: 새로운 그룹에 참여하면, 당신은 새로운 모둠과 제안에 대해 이메일을 받을 수 없습니다.
default_settings.quiet_description: 새로운 그룹에 참여하면, 당신은 행동에 대해 이메일을 받을 수 없습니다..

no_groups.show_all: 당신은 가입된 그룹이 없기 때문에 최근 모둠이 없습니다.
no_groups.show_muted: 가입된 그룹이 없기 때문에 대기중인 모둠이 없습니다.

explain_mute.title: 대기중인 주제가 아직 없습니다.
explain_mute.explanation_html: Muting is a way to hide or silence threads you're not interested in. Muting means you won't see it in Recent or Unread, and you won't be notified about activity in that thread, like proposals. You'll only be alerted if someone @mentions your name.
explain_mute.instructions: To mute a thread, hover over it and click the mute icon.
explain_mute.see_muted_html: To see your muted threads, click "Muted". You can unmute by hovering and clicking the same icon.

thread_preview.pinned: This thread has been pinned. It will remain at the top of the group's list of threads for all users.

no_groups.explanation: You have no unread threads because you are not a member of any groups.

pin_thread_modal.title: Pin thread
pin_thread_modal.helptext: Pinned threads always appear at the top of their group's list of threads. They can be used to inform members of important announcements, or to promote common material like a code of conduct or community guidelines.
pin_thread_modal.helptext_two: You may remove pins at any time by selecting 'Unpin' from the thread dropdown

move_thread_form.title: 쓰레드 이동
move_thread_form.confirm_change_to_private_thread: {{groupName}}은 공개 그룹입니다. 이 주제도 공개됩니다. 계속 하시겠습니까?

proposal_edited_item.name: 제안 제목 수정: {{title}}
proposal_edited_item.closing_at_description_name: 제안 제목, 설명, 종료시간 수정 완료

discussion_edited_item.title: 주제 제목 수정 완료: {{title}}
discussion_edited_item.private_title: updated the thread title and privacy
discussion_edited_item.description_private: updated the thread context and privacy
discussion_edited_item.description_private_title: updated the thread title, context and privacy

contact_message_form.helptext: Want to get in touch? Just enter a message below and you'll hear from us shortly.
contact_message_form.contact_us_email: (You can also always reach us at contact@loomio.org)
contact_message_form.new_contact_message: Thanks for getting in touch; we''ll get back to you soon!

help_page.coordinating_details:
코디네이터로서 귀하는 루미오 그룹을 만들고 다른 사람들을 초대할 의무가 있습니다.
루미오의 새로운 기능 사용법을 익혀 감에 따라 귀하의 그룹은 보다 효과적으로 협업하고
함께 훌륭한 의사결정을 만들어내는 새로운 프로세스를 배우게 될 것입니다.
여기 성공적인 그룹을 만드는데 도움이 되는 몇가지 요령이 있습니다.
help_page.engaging_html:
Tips for engaging your group

People will be excited to jump in and start participating when there’s an engaging proposal on the table. A good proposal contains a plan of action for the group, so that it’s immediately obvious what it means to agree or disagree. Think about how you can identify discussions/decisions the group is currently undertaking in person or by email that would be easier if they were on Loomio.

If your group is just starting out, you could start a lighthearted decision, to give everyone a chance to play with the tool and see the decisionmaking process in action.

Another simple way to encourage people to engage in a discussion is to use the @mention feature to prompt specific people; this will send them an email to tell them they’ve been mentioned in a comment.
help_page.example1_html:
폭넓은 주제에 대해 논의하고 함께 해결책을 만들어가기 위해 그룹이 필요합니다.

전략: 제안을 하기 전에 한동안 어떤 주제에 대해 논의해 봅니다.

구체적인 해결책으로 바로 넘어가기 전에, 문제에 대해 충분히 서로 이해한다면, 논의를 통해 최고의 결과에 도달할 수 있습니다. 사람들이 그 과정에 참여할 때, 그 결과에 동참할 확률이 높아질 겁니다.
help_page.example2_html:
You already have a proposal in mind, and you want to get signoff from the group to move forward.

Strategy: Start a discussion about a specific decision and make a proposal immediately.

If you’ve got a clear outcome in mind but you want to make sure there aren’t any critical concerns, you can use the proposal to get quick input into a decision.

You can do things like finalise a document, approve an application, or signoff on a piece of work.
help_page.getting_started_description: 왼편에는 그룹 토론의 주제와 교환하고 있는 생각과 정보들이 있으며, 그룹에서 결정을 내린경우는 오른쪽에 나타나게 됩니다.
help_page.have_your_say_details_html:
이야기할 준비가 됐다면 네 개의 결정 버튼을 클릭하세요.

결정을 했다면, 간략하게 설명을 달아주세요. 파이 차트 아래에서, 다른 사람들의 생각을 볼 수 있어서 빠르고 쉽게 논의를 파악할 수 있습니다. 새로운 정보를 알게 되면, 언제든 결정을 바꿀 수 있습니다.
help_page.have_a_discussion_description:
주제와 관련된 정보와 배경 정보는 페이지의 상단에 위치해 있습니다. 
토론에 여러분의 목소리를 담기 위해서는 댓글 상자를 이용하세요.
help_page.invitation_html:
훌륭한 초대글 작성하기

새로 온 사람들이면 누구나 궁금해하는 첫 질문은 ‘이 그룹은 뭐하는 곳이지?’입니다.

그룹을 설명할 수 있는 가장 단순한 방법에 대해 생각해보세요: 무엇을 함께 해보고 싶나요? 어떤 종류의 결정을 하죠?

사람들을 루미오에 가입하도록 초대하기 전에 우선 사람들과 이야기해 보는게 좋습니다.

사람들은 왜 내가 초대받았는지, 나에게 뭘 기대하는지 왜 시간을 들여 새로운 도구를 사용하는 방법을 배워야 하는지 알고 싶어하겠죠.
help_page.join_the_community_description_html:
우리가 루미오라는 도구를 최대한 활용하는 방법과 어떻게 하면 더 향상시킬 수 있을지에 대해 이야기하는 루미오 커뮤니티에 들어오는 모든 사람들을 환영합니다.

루미오 커뮤니티에 가려면 여기를 클릭하세요.
help_page.images_and_text_formatting_html:
루미오는 이미지를 표시하고 텍스트 스타일링을 위해 ‘마크다운’을 사용합니다. 댓글 영역 아래 조그만 회색 아이콘을 클릭해 마크다운을 사용할 수 있습니다.

마크다운 사용법을 알고 싶으면 여기를 클릭하세요.
help_page.keep_up_to_date_html:
화면 상단의 그룹명을 클릭하면 그룹 페이지로 갈 수 있습니다. 거기서 그 그룹의 모든 논의와 결정들의 목록을 볼 수 있습니다. 하나 이상의 그룹에 참여하고 있으면, 홈페이지에서 한번에 모든 그룹의 모든 활동을 볼 수 있습니다.

참여하고 있는 그룹에서 중요한 일이 벌어지면 이메일로 알림을 받게 됩니다. 여기서 이메일 설정을 수정할 수 있습니다.
help_page.make_a_decision_description: 그룹이 결정을 내릴 준비가 되면 누구나 제안을 할 수 있습니다. 행동의 과정을 명확히 설명하고 동의하거나 동의하지 않는것이 어떤 뜻인지 배경정보를 제공해 주세요.
help_page.prompt_people_details: 그룹에 특정인에 관심을 얻기를 원한다면 '@'뒤에 이름을 적으세요. 그렇게 하면 코멘트에 이름이 언급된 내용을 이메일을 통해서 알게 됩니다.
help_page.positions_abstain_description: 기권 은 확신하지 않거나 다른 사람들이 당신을 제외하고 결정을 내리는것에 동의한다는 뜻입니다.
help_page.positions_disagree_description: 반대 는 더 낳은 대안이 있다고 생각하지만 그룹에서 계속 논의가 이어지기를 바란다는 뜻입니다.
help_page.positions_block_description: 차단 은 심각하게 반대하고 있고 이것이 제안으로 발전하는것을 반대합니다.
help_page.start_discussion_html:
When you start a discussion, make sure the title conveys the topic succinctly. Use the Context Panel to give all the background information necessary for the group to have a productive and informed discussion.

During the discussion, the Context Panel can be updated as new information comes to light. As well as clarifying the topic, you can use this space for sharing resources, summarising the discussion as it progresses, or outlining the decisionmaking protocols your group is using.
help_page.start_proposal_html:
제목을 명확하고 간결하게 만들면, 사람들은 즉시 동의할지 아니면 반대할지 알 수 있게 됩니다.

제안이 바로 명확한 합의에 이르지 못한다고 해서 세계가 멸망하는 건 아니죠. 그룹이 첫 번째 제안을 좋아하지 않으면 누구나 새로운 제안을 시작해서 제기한 문제를 해결하고 앞으로 나아가기 위한 과정을 계속할 수 있습니다.

이런 역동적인 과정 속에서, 그룹의 집단적 지혜를 통해 누구나 각자 생각할 수 있는 것보다 더 좋은 생각에 도달할 수 있습니다.

결정하는데 여유가 더 필요한 것 같으면, 언제든 제안 마감시간을 연장할 수 있습니다. 제안 마감 24 시간 전에 모든 사람들은 이메일 알림을 받게 됩니다.

explore_page.no_results_found: Can't find the group you're looking for? If a group's privacy is set to 'secret', it won't appear here. If you know who coordinates the group, you could ask them for an invite.

enable.title: 새로운 루미오 사용하기
enable.intro: We've rebuilt Loomio and we need your help to make sure it is awesome!
enable.body_html:
What's the difference anyway?

The new interface is like the old interface but newer:

  • Everything updates live on the page as it happens
  • It’s designed for all your devices, from smartphone to desktop
  • It’s accessible to people who are blind, and translated into heaps of languages

It uses the same database as the old interface, meaning it will have all your existing groups and discussions.

There is a link to "Give feedback" in the bottom left corner. You'll also see a link there to "Switch back to old Loomio", which will remain available for the next little while.

We really look forward to hearing your feedback, thanks for your time and support.

disable.title: 새로운 루미오를 이용해주셔서 감사합니다
disable.body_html: 이런 뭔가 잘못 처리되었나요? 새로운 버전의 루미오에서 좋지 않은 일이 발생되어 죄송합니다.
disable.give_feedback: 우리가 더 나아질 수 있도록 피드백을 나눠주세요.

poll_common_set_outcome_panel.poll: This poll has closed. Share the outcome with the group.
poll_common_set_outcome_panel.proposal: This proposal has closed. Please consider what as been said and share an outcome, so people know what’ll happen next.
poll_common_set_outcome_panel.count: This check has closed. Share an outcome to complete the process.
poll_common_set_outcome_panel.meeting: This time poll has closed. Share an outcome to let others know when the meeting will happen.
poll_common_set_outcome_panel.dot_vote: This dot vote has closed. Share an outcome with the group.
poll_common_set_outcome_panel.ranked_choice: This ranked choice poll has closed. Share an outcome with the group.

poll_common_outcome_form.statement_placeholder: Summarise the responses and explain what will happen next.

poll_common_delete_modal.question: Are you sure you want to delete this?
poll_common_delete_modal.title: Delete decision

poll_common_unsubscribe_form.title: Receive updates
poll_common_unsubscribe_form.label: Receive email updates about this decision
poll_common_unsubscribe_form.tooltip: Loomio can send email updates to keep you informed about this decision, such as when it is edited, when it expires, or when an outcome has been set. Unchecking this box ensures that you won't receive further email notifications for decision.
poll_common_unsubscribe_form.helptext_on: You will receive emails about activity in this decision
poll_common_unsubscribe_form.helptext_off: You will not receive any emails about this decision

poll_common_form.title: Title
poll_common_form.no_options: You haven't added any options yet.

poll_proposal_form.tool_tip_expanded:
A proposal is a tool for seeking collective agreement about a statement or course of action.

Participants can agree, abstain, disagree or block - and give a statement to explain their position.

A pie chart gives an overview of the positions in the group, while the statements allow individual voices to be heard.

Don't be discouraged if you don't see agreement at first, proposals are designed to surface issues that need resolving.

With good participation a proposal is a powerful mandate to take action.

Learn more on Loomio School.
poll_proposal_form.tip: Seek collective agreement through a process which allows all voices to be heard. Learn more
poll_proposal_form.title_placeholder: E.g. Let's go to the moon!
poll_proposal_form.details_placeholder: Give enough information so everyone knows what it means to agree or disagree

poll_poll_form.tool_tip_expanded:
Use a poll to measure popularity or offer a choice.

Provide some options to choose from. Decide if participants choose single or multiple options as their response.

Everyone votes, and can enter a statement too if they like. Results are represented in a bar graph.

Learn more on Loomio School.
poll_poll_form.tool_tip_collapsed: Measure popularity or offer a choice
poll_poll_form.tip: Measure the popularity of different options
poll_poll_form.title_placeholder: E.g. Where do you want to go on holiday?
poll_poll_form.details_placeholder: Provide any clarifying details people might need to answer the question.
poll_poll_form.multiple_choice_explained: Allow voters to select as many options as they like.

poll_count_form.tool_tip_expanded:
A check is a tool with many possible uses but only 2 responses: Tick or Dash.

Use it to engage people with an offer, like an RSVP: "I'm coming to the event" or "I'll join the working group".

Or use it to track completion of a task: "I've checked my contact details are correct", or "I've read the document and left my feedback".

A check has a goal, which is the number of participants you'd like. The goal indicates to the group if something needs more attention or is well subscribed.

A day before the check closes, it will remind those who have not participated to do so - like a digital cat herder.

Learn more on Loomio School.
poll_count_form.tip: Engage people with an offer or request
poll_count_form.title_placeholder: E.g. Who wants to join the working group?
poll_count_form.details_placeholder: Explain what commitment is involved, or give details about how to participate.

poll_dot_vote_form.tool_tip_expanded:
Dot voting is a way to prioritise a list of options.

Participants are given a limited number of ‘dots’ which they can allocate however they like among the options provided to represent their own preferences.

The totals of the results are shown, as well as and the individual votes, so you can consider various points of view.

Learn more on Loomio School.
poll_dot_vote_form.title_placeholder: E.g. How should we allocate our budget?
poll_dot_vote_form.details_placeholder: Provide any clarifying details people might need to participate

poll_meeting_form.tool_tip_expanded:
Use a time poll to find when people are available to meet.

Enter a list of dates or times when you could have your meeting.

Participants tick those which they’re able to attend, or they can use the statement field to explain their circumstances, so you can update the options if necessary.

If you add new times during a time poll, people who have already voted are prompted to update their response.

You can then see who’s available when, and decide when to meet.

Times are automatically converted to the participant's local time zone.

Learn more on Loomio School.
poll_meeting_form.tip: Find out when people are available to meet
poll_meeting_form.title_placeholder: E.g. When should we have our next meetup?
poll_meeting_form.details_placeholder: Provide any clarifying details people might need to participate
poll_meeting_form.no_options: You haven't added any time slots yet.

poll_ranked_choice_form.tool_tip_expanded:
Ranked choice is a voting method which allows each voter to respond with their preferences in order.

It's preferable when 'vote stealing' is a concern (ie, two somewhat popular options are similar enough that they end up sharing votes between them), and can be used to implement a Condorcet, or Instant Runoff style election.
poll_ranked_choice_form.tip: Find out when people are available to meet
poll_ranked_choice_form.title_placeholder: E.g. who should take over as chairman of the board?
poll_ranked_choice_form.details_placeholder: Provide any clarifying details people might need to participate
poll_ranked_choice_form.no_options: You haven't added any options yet.
poll_ranked_choice_form.minimum_stance_choices_helptext: Number of options each voter may rank

poll_proposal_vote_form.abstain_reason_placeholder: Let people know why you’re opting out of this decision
poll_proposal_vote_form.agree_reason_placeholder: What do you like about the proposal and how will it benefit the group?
poll_proposal_vote_form.disagree_reason_placeholder: How could this proposal be improved so that you can support it?
poll_proposal_vote_form.block_reason_placeholder: Explain your objection to this proposal and why it should not go ahead

poll_proposal_options.agree_meaning: This proposal is good enough to be adopted by the group
poll_proposal_options.abstain_meaning: Not sure, don’t know or don’t mind. Will support the outcome either way
poll_proposal_options.disagree_meaning: I don’t support the proposal. It should not go ahead.
poll_proposal_options.block_meaning: The urgent attention of the group is required to address a deep concern

poll_count_options.yes_meaning: I volunteer, give my consent, or have completed the given task
poll_count_options.no_meaning: I am unable to contribute or to participate in this decision

poll_count_vote_form.reason_placeholder: Leave a message if you like

poll_meeting_vote_form.reason_placeholder: Explain when you're free (or busy), in case the author wants to add options.

poll_dot_vote_vote_form.too_many_dots: You have used too many dots.

poll_ranked_choice_vote_form.helptext: Drag and drop options in order of preference (1 being your most preferred option). Your top {{count}} choices will be recorded.

poll_common_share_form.share_a_link_helptext: Create a shareable link to distribute. Anyone who has access to the link will be able to participate.
poll_common_share_form.invite_visitor_helptext: Invite individuals to this decision by email address. Guests will be able to participate in this decision only.
poll_common_share_form.shareable_link_created: Anyone can now participate in this decision
poll_common_share_form.share_group_helptext: Select a Loomio group to share this decision with. Members of the group will be able to participate.
poll_common_share_form.cannot_move_poll_helptext: This poll is part of the discussion {{discussion}} in {{group}}, and so cannot be moved.
poll_common_share_form.move_group_helptext: Be careful! Moving a decision out of a group may cause some people to lose access to it. Existing votes will still be recorded.

poll_common_subscribe_form.receive_updates_helptext: If you'd like to receive an email about the outcome of this poll, enter your email address below
poll_common_subscribe_form.email_saved: You will receive an email about the outcome of this poll

poll_common_example_card.helptext_after: of your own, and invite some people to try it.

auth_form.choose_an_account: Sign in via a third party, or enter your email address to continue.

auth_form.invalid_password: Sorry, that password doesn't match the one we have on file
auth_form.email_not_found: Sorry, we couldn't find an account with that email address
auth_form.login_link_helptext:
Click the button below and we'll send you a link to sign in instantly.
If you'd like to use a password to log in in the future, you can set one from your profile page.
auth_form.login_link_helptext_with_password: Enter your password, or sign in via email.
auth_form.sign_up_helptext: Just enter the name you'd like to be known by, and we'll send you a link to log in.
auth_form.oauth_confirm_helptext: Just confirm your details below, and we'll send you a link to log in.
auth_form.account_inactive: Uh-oh, it looks like the account for {{email}} has been deactivated! Please contact us to reactivate your account.
auth_form.new_to_loomio: New to Loomio? Create a new account

install_slack.modal_helptext: First up, you'll need to sign in to slack. We'll redirect you there automatically in a second, or you can click the button below to continue.

card.install_helptext: Loomio bot notifies your Slack team of discussions and decisions on Loomio. You can also start decisions and vote from within Slack.
card.installed_helptext: This group has been connected to the slack team {{team}}. Events from this group will appear in the {{channel}} channel.
card.confirm_remove_helptext:
Your slack channel will no longer receive updates about this group.
You can always go back and add it again.

install.heading: Step 1: Select a Loomio group to integrate
install.tooltip_heading: Loomio and Slack work great together
install.and_also_this: Start polls instantly and get feedback in real time
install.and_also_also_this: Let people know outcome and iterate your thinking quickly
install.add_to_group_helptext: Select a group to link with Slack
install.create_new_group_helptext: Don't have a Loomio group? Simply enter a name and we'll make one for you

invite.heading: Step 2: Setup a Slack channel
invite.helptext: Success! Now, select a channel you'd like us to post updates into.
invite.publish_group_helptext_on: We'll post the a message into this channel to instruct people how to use LoomioBot.
invite.publish_group_helptext_off: We won't post anything until you create a poll.

decide.heading: Step 3: Make a decision together
decide.helptext: Now that you're all set up, it's time to start making decisions. Select from one of the options below:

slack_added_modal.title: Success!
slack_added_modal.helptext: You've successfully added Slack to your Loomio group {{name}}. Now, whenever anyone starts a poll in this group, they'll have the option to post updates about that poll into a channel in your slack team.

slack_page.header: Loomio and Slack work great together!
slack_page.intro: We're proud to introduce LoomioBot, a friendly helper for use with Slack.
slack_page.description: LoomioBot can help you supercharge your team's decisionmaking by combining Slack’s lightning-fast realtime communication, with the robust, simple tools in Loomio.
slack_page.from_chat_to_discussion:
Slack's realtime chat is great for keeping in touch and getting quick responses.
Loomio's threads are the online equivilent of a meeting.
Keep everything about a topic in one place,
let people participate in their own time,
and get clear outcomes with Loomio's decision making tools.
slack_page.grant_access_subtext: No need to sync contact lists, or invite people to tools they're not familiar with. LoomioBot seamlessly authenticates anyone in your slack channel to your Loomio group.
slack_page.start_poll_subtext: Want to get a quick temperature check of the people in the room? Type a simple command and we'll prepare a decision to share with your team instantly
slack_page.receive_updates: Receive updates about decisions in real time
slack_page.receive_updates_subtext: Reach people where they are. Everyone on slack will receive updates about important events as they happen.
slack_page.vote_instantly_subtext: No need to leave your chat window to make your voice heard; simply click a button and you're done!
slack_page.on_paid_plan: The LoomioBot integration is available for groups on a Gold plan or higher

pricing_page.free_is_for_community_and_evaluation_htm:
Our free plan is for casual and community groups or evaluation purposes.
Want the Gold plan for your community or non-profit group? Use coupon code NFP5USD for $5/month price.
pricing_page.privacy_respected: We respect your privacy and will never sell your data to third parties, nor put advertising into Loomio.
pricing_page.prices_in_us_dollars: Prices are per group, in US dollars, plus sales tax where applicable.
pricing_page.need_something_else_html: Need managed private hosting, consultation & training, custom branding, or something else?

navigation.trademark_statement: © 2017 Loomio Cooperative Limited. All rights reserved. “Loomio” is a registered trademark of Loomio Cooperative Limited.
navigation.not_slack: Loomio is not created by, affiliated with, or supported by Slack Technologies, Inc.

marketing.too_many_emails_and_meetings: Too many emails and tedious meetings?
marketing.inclusive_clear_and_effecient_tools: Thoughfully designed to be inclusive, clear, and efficient
marketing.loomio_is_the_answer: Loomio saves time, gives clear outcomes, and keeps everything in one place.
marketing.ben_quote: “Our communications are more effective and efficient, and everything is in one place.”
marketing.teddy_quote: “People learn to engage more usefully with one another, and that carries over into face-to-face working.”
marketing.tom_quote: “We reached people that otherwise wouldn’t have contributed to the conversation, including marginalised populations and youth.”
marketing.choose_the_tool: Choose the tool that suits your situation.
marketing.proposals_bring_conclusion_html: Proposals are an effective way to bring a discussion to conclusion.
marketing.hear_from_everyone: Hear from everyone - even the quieter voices, and see the big picture at a glance.
marketing.proposals_highlight_agreement: Proposals highlight agreement, and can surface misunderstandings or issues that need to be resolved.
marketing.time_poll_finds_when_html: Time poll finds when everyone can meet. It works across organisations and automatically converts time zones.
marketing.watch_time_poll_video: Watch video: Introduction to Loomio Time Poll
marketing.discuss_stratergy_and_prioritise_html: Discuss strategy and prioritise with Dot voting and Polling
marketing.when_there_are_tasks_to_be_done_html: When there are tasks to be done, or you just want to get an 'ok' from people, Check makes participation clear and saves you chasing people up.
marketing.a_place_for_your: A place for your discussions & decisions
marketing.a_loomio_group_is_a_safe_place_html: A Loomio group is a safe place to have considered discussions and make decisions away from social media.
marketing.its_secure_and_searchable: It's a secure and searchable archive of your discussions, decisions, and files.
marketing.make_a_decision_in_email: Make a decision in email, with anyone.
marketing.no_prior_setup_required: No prior setup required. Use it any time.
marketing.check_your_inbox: Check your inbox for an email from Loomio
marketing.your_group_will_be_included_automaticall: Start a decision, your group will be included automatically.
marketing.watch_the_video_to_see_it: Watch the video to see it in action!
marketing.find_out_more_about_slack_integration: Find out more about our Slack integration
marketing.slack_integration_in_standard_plan: Slack integration is included in our gold plan.
marketing.works_on_all_devices: Works on all devices and platforms.
marketing.loomio_is_a_web_app: Loomio is a web app with great desktop and mobile support.
marketing.no_thinking_up_or_remembering: No thinking up, remembering, or typing! Just log in with a link sent to your email, or sign in via google or facebook.
marketing.we_know_it_can_be_hard: We know it can be hard to start using a new tool. With Loomio you can participate and stay updated by email.
marketing.loomio_has_great_notifications_and_remin: Loomio has great notifications and reminders, so decisions are inclusive and effective.
marketing.loomio_can_translate: Loomio can translate content from one language to another, enabling people to speak across languages.
marketing.loomio_is_accessible: Loomio is accessible to people with visual impairments.
marketing.approved_by_nz_government: We're approved for use by the NZ government.
marketing.we_will_never_sell_your_data: We will never sell you data to third parties, or put advertising into Loomio.

press.fast_company: The beauty of Loomio is in it's simplicity. It does exactly what it needs to do and no more.
press.boingboing: Loomio seems to have a good mix of political savvy, technical knowhow, and design sense.
press.bbc: Loomio is set to be the Facebook of the citizen web.

marketing.loomio_is_a_social_enterprise: Loomio is a social enterprise collectively owned by the people building it.
marketing.loomio_exists_to: Loomio exists to make it easy for anyone, anywhere, to participate in decisions that affect their lives.

introduction.first_paragraph: Loomio is open source software, built by a worker-owned cooperative social enterprise. We are based in Aotearoa New Zealand, and are part of the
introduction.second_paragraph: We believe that more groups practicing effective, inclusive decision-making can change organisational dynamics at a global scale. Loomio exists to make it easy for anyone, anywhere, to participate in decisions that affect their lives.

story.heading: Story
story.first_paragraph:
Loomio began in 2011, when activists from Occupy Wall Street and social entrepreneurs from the Enspiral Network realised they needed to solve the same problem: fast, inclusive, effective decision-making without meetings.
In 2012, we formed our cooperative and released a prototype (Loomio Beta). We found that many others around the world needed the same solution.
story.second_paragraph:
In 2013, we ran a successful international crowdfunding campaign, enabling us to work on a new version of the software, Loomio 1.0, which was released the following year.
In 2015, we raised a round of ethical capital, and are working to bring collaborative decision-making to millions more people around the world.

people.heading: People
people.introduction: We’re a passionate team with deep expertise in group process facilitation, social change, business entrepreneurship, and open technology development.
people.alanna: Co-founder, facilitator, bossless leadership geek, Enspiral Foundation director, cat lover
people.babs: Company Secretary, operations, activist, nature lover
people.ben: Co-founder and director, community organizer, collective intelligence researcher
people.hannah: Software developer, user support, illustrator and DIY publisher, creative activist
people.james: Senior software developer, open source community coordinator, daring swashbuckler
people.mary: Organisational wrangler, collaborator, team coach, pot luck hoster, star gazer
people.matthew: Looking after customers, numbers, and design
people.michael: Director, business and customer development, coordinator, startup coach, motorcyclist
people.mj: Director, US based strategist, dot connector, coach, proud mama
people.richard: Co-founder and software developer, activist, open source hardware hacker
people.robert: Senior developer, DevOps, architecture. Thinks up ideas and writes them into software
people.vivien: Co-founder, Chair of Loomio Board, Executive Director of UNICEF New Zealand

advisors.heading: Advisors
advisors.introduction: We’re backed by an Advisory Council with some of the brightest minds in democracy and tech internationally.
advisors.sascha: Founder of X-Lab & Open Technology Institute
advisors.katherine: Former Senior Vice President, AOL, Vice Chair of Root Capital
advisors.joi: Director of MIT Media Lab, Co-founder Creative Commons, Board of Mozilla Foundation
advisors.douglas: Bestselling author, CNN commentator, media theorist

purpose_and_values.heading: Purpose & Values
purpose_and_values.mission_statement: The Loomio Co-operative exists to create a world where it’s easy for anyone to participate in decisions that affect them.
purpose_and_values.introduction:
With the right collaborative process, groups generate better ideas, decisions and actions than any individual would by themselves.
The Loomio Co-operative aims to break down the barriers to participation in decision-making at every level: in neighbourhoods, community organisations, businesses, social movements, and local and national governance.
purpose_and_values.coop_body:
Loomio is a social enterprise collectively owned by the people building it. Unlike a traditional profit­ maximising company, revenue is not an end in itself, but a means towards achieving a core social purpose.
A worker-owned cooperative structure is a powerful way to live our values of collaboration and collective ownership.
purpose_and_values.independent_body: Loomio is committed to remaining independent so it can provide a neutral place for any group to come together.
purpose_and_values.open_source_body: Loomio aims to develop open-source tools that make collaboration accessible to everyone.
purpose_and_values.adaptive_body: Loomio aims to develop tools which are iterative, self-reflexive and adaptive, driven by the collective wisdom of the user community.
purpose_and_values.transparent_body:
The Loomio Co-operative will be surrounded by a valued community of users and contributors. This community must be confident that the Loomio Co-operative is doing what it says it is.
We are committed to high standards for sharing information.

loomio_tags.destroy_helptext: This will destroy this tag and remove it from all threads in the group. Are you sure?
loomio_tags.helptext: Tags allow you to categorize conversations and easily find them later
loomio_tags.no_tags_present: No threads were found with that tag! Try selecting another one.

legacy_trial_expired_modal.heading: 올해도 루미오를 이용해주셔서 감사합니다!
legacy_trial_expired_modal.body:
지난 한해 동안 지원해주신 것에 정말로 감사드리며, 또한 우리는 2016년에 보다 나은 루미오를 만드는 작업에 들떠 있습니다.

루미오가 귀하의 단체에 유용했나요? 우리는 이제 막 가격 정책을 발표했습니다. 그리고 지금까지 루미오를 어느 정도 사용해온 단체들에게 자신들에게 적합한 정책plan을 선택해달라고 요청했습니다.

donation_modal.body: 루미오는 사회적 기업입니다. 우리의 사명은 누구나 자기에게 영향을 미치는 의사결정에 쉽게 참여할 수 있는 세계를 만드는 것입니다.

trial_card.in_progress_body: {{name}}으로 루미오를 시범 사용해주신 것에 대해 감사드립니다. 언제든지 귀하의 그룹에 적합한 가격 체계를 선택하실 수 있습니다.
trial_card.expired_body_html: {{name}} 님의 루미오 시범 사용이 만료되었습니다. 계속 사용하시려면 귀하의 그룹에 적합한 가격체계를 선택하세요.
